If you’ve never stayed in a farmhouse you might be surprised by the creaks and other noises you hear but that’s nothing new to us. The price was several hundred dollars less than a hotel in Grand Forks, which was awesome. It’s a great option that we are going to remember the next time we’re in the area. Thanks Lynne!
